name: The Flour Flirt
description:
It's a great apron that can be made with brights, neutrals, patterns, solids, or anything else that makes you happy!

Here is the pattern info quoted from the back.

"We said we'd make dinner, We didn't say we'd like it!
Change that up a little with a cute apron. When you feel cute even breakfast can be made with a smile!
BONUS!
This pattern also comes with instructions to make a child sized version of the Flour Flirt reversible apron!"

Supplies needed-
Four- 1/2 yd cuts (a total of 2 yds) of coordinating fabric; 2 patterns for each side
1/4 yd of contrasting fabric for the straps

categories.name: Accessory Patterns - Because we know you like to sew more than just quilts!
